item.title: Spawning a bank
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“pkkid, post:2, topic:317876”]Easy:
STEP 1:
CTR+F this in the client.java SERVERSIDE:

public void NewObjects()

STEP2:
You should somthing like this:

makeGlobalObject(2531, 4776, 1309, -2, 10); // yew makeGlobalObject(3286, 3211, 2562, 0, 10); // skillz makeGlobalObject(2849, 3433, 2094, 0, 10); //mining makeGlobalObject(2850, 3433, 2091, 0, 10); //mining makeGlobalObject(2851, 3433, 2093, 0, 10); //mining makeGlobalObject(2852, 3433, 2111, 0, 10); //mining makeGlobalObject(2853, 3433, 2097, 0, 10); //mining

3286=x coord 3211=y coord 4776= ID of object 0= idk 10= wich side it need to face NORTH SOUTH WEST EAST

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 06:13:45 pm[/size][hr]REP++ me pl0x[/quote]

infact, keep the 10, and change the 0 as that is which way you want it to face.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning a bank
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

in 317

search for:

    public void NewObjects() {

under it should be codes like

[code] makeGlobalObject(2427, 3074, 2213, 0, 10); // bankcode]

2709 = object

3487, 9398 = coords (sorry if im wrong)

npc is a little bit more complicated

autospawn them then use the “bank” command as a thing the banker does.
unless it is already said.

(kind of a newbie sinc ei havent coded in years)[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 06:18:38 pm[/size][hr]yes this is for spawning any objects
